edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.util

Class VoronoiDiagram

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.util.VoronoiDiagram

  • public class VoronoiDiagram
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a 2D Voronoi Diagram and the methods to construct one. It takes a series of points, constructs the diagram, and assigns each region in the diagram a unique label.
    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VoronoiDiagram(java.util.List<org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.twod.Vector2D> pointsInput)
      Constrcuts a new VoronoiDiagram from a list of input points.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VoronoiDiagram

        public VoronoiDiagram(java.util.List<org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.twod.Vector2D> pointsInput)
        Constrcuts a new VoronoiDiagram from a list of input points. Each of these points will be assigned a unique region in the final diagram; the ordering of the points determines the region label (1-indexed) in the diagram.
        Parameters:
        pointsInput - a List of Vector2D objects that describe the set of points around which the diagram will be constructed.

    • Method Detail

      • constructBisectingHyperplane

        protected org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.partitioning.Hyperplane<org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.twod.Euclidean2D> constructBisectingHyperplane(org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.twod.Vector2D firstPoint,
                                                                                                                                                   org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.twod.Vector2D secondPoint)

      • isLeaf

        protected boolean isLeaf(org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.partitioning.BSPTree<org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.twod.Euclidean2D> node)

      • getRegionNumber

        public int getRegionNumber(org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.twod.Vector2D point)
        Gets the number of the region in which a supplied point lies.
        Parameters:
        point - a Vector2D describing the point whose region is being queried.
        Returns:
        an int that is the label of the region in which the supplied vector lies. this label corresponds to the (1-indexed) order in which the points were supplied to the constructor.

        protected java.lang.Integer findClosestRegion(org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.twod.Vector2D lookup)
